TopicTitle: Please help with the Infernal Robotics

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, i'm italian so sorry for my orrible english

I'm writing to ask you about the "Infernal robotics" mod, i have KSP 1.2.2, and i use tne MechJeb2 mod, i want use the infernal robotics mod and i see here:

In this discussion i see that the mod was updated to the 1.2 version of KSP.... now, i tried to install it, but it doesn't work !! Please someone can explain to me how install it ?= I do not understand English well so please explain slowly

Ahhhh... the link you posted is not for Infernal Robotics, it's an add on sequencer for IR.

I believe the page (and link) you want is here:

 

PS, your English was fine!

Thanks.... but, i tried to install this mod:

I have all the components, but i can't use the console to move the different pistons and motors ! So, that add that i posted in the post, is useful for the 1.2 ? If yes, how i can install it ?

Use this:

https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases

This should solve your problem. Download the latest pre-release, then insert the parts for IR in. They seem to be working to make it compatible with 1.2.

Hope I helped.

Detailed Explanation:

Spoiler
  1. Delete any old MagicSmokeIndustries folders from your KSP GameData folder.
  2. Download the Pre-Release of MagicSmokeIndustries Infernal Robotics (https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases)
  3. Download this too: https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases/download/2.0.0/IR-LegacyParts.zip
  4. Copy the parts to your GameData folder. (Make sure the parts are in the MagicSmokeIndustries folder)
  5. Run KSP
  6. Profit!

Better explanation.
